entry.title: 如何创建Android启动界面Splash Screen
entry.content:
1. 制作一张启动图片splash.jpg，放置在res/drawable文件夹中。

2. 新建布局文件splash.xml：
[code lang=“xml”] <?xml version=“1.0” encoding=“utf-8”?> 

android:orientation="vertical"<br />
android:layout_width="fill_parent"<br />
android:layout_height="fill_parent">
<ImageView<br />
    android:layout_width="fill_parent"<br />
    android:layout_height="fill_parent"<br />
    android:scaleType="fitXY"<br />
    android:src="@drawable/splash" />

```

3. 新建SplashActivity，代码如下：
``` package com.codemany.splash;

import android.app.Activity;
import android.content.Intent;
import android.os.Bundle;
import android.view.MotionEvent;

public class SplashActivity extends Activity {

private boolean active = true;<br />
private int splashTime = 5000; // time to display the splash screen in ms

@Override

public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {<br />
    super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);<br />
    setContentView(R.layout.splash);

Thread splashTread = new Thread() {

        @Override<br />
        public void run() {<br />
            try {<br />
                int waited = 0;<br />
                while (active && (waited < splashTime)) {<br />
                    sleep(100);<br />
                    if (active) {<br />
                        waited += 100;<br />
                    }<br />
                }<br />
            } catch(InterruptedException e) {<br />
            } finally {<br />
                finish();<br />
                Intent intent = new Intent(SplashActivity.this, MainActivity.class);<br />
                startActivity(intent);<br />
                //stop();<br />
            }<br />
        }<br />
    };<br />
    splashTread.start();<br />
}

@Override

public boolean onTouchEvent(MotionEvent event) {<br />
    if (event.getAction() == MotionEvent.ACTION_DOWN) {<br />
        active = false;<br />
    }<br />
    return true;<br />
}<br />

} ```

4. 修改AndroidManifest.xml文件，将启动界面Activity改为默认启动，并且设置标题栏不可见。
[code lang=“xml”] <?xml version=“1.0” encoding=“utf-8”?> 

package="com.codemany.splash"<br />
android:versionCode="1"<br />
android:versionName="1.0">


    <activity android:name=".SplashActivity" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.NoTitleBar">
        <intent-filter>
            <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
            <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" />
        </intent-filter>
    </activity>


</application>

<uses-sdk android:minSdkVersion=“4” /> [/code]
